title: Drawing, "Hood detail, die-cast strip, for John Deere", November 22, 1960
medium: Pen and ink, graphite on tracing tissue
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right: DEERE & COMPANY / DISPLAY FILE.
inscribed: Printed in black ink, lower right: NO. CHANGE DATE NO. ISSUED TO DATE / CLIENT / TITLE / HENRY DREYFUSS / NEW YORK – 4 WEST 58TH STREET, NEW YORK 19 / CALIFORNIA – 500 COLUMBIA STREET, SOUTH PASADENA / DRAWN APPROVED DATE SCALE DRAWING NO. Inscribed in graphite, upper right: FRONT OF HOOD FLANGED, / NOTCHED, & PUNCHED TO / RECEIVE EDGE MOLDING.; center right: SHELL MOLDED IRON / FRONT EDGE; center: EDGE MOLDING COULD BE / FASHIONED WITH : INTEGERAL / STUDS, SELF-TAPPING SCREWS,  / GROOVE PINS AND TINNERMAN NUTS.; lower left: SECTION ON HOOD CL; lower right: R&E / HOOD DETAIL / CAST FRONT. / TE (?) TE (?) 11-7-60 NONE CS60-6.
description: Drawing of hood front for John Deere tractor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hood detail, die-cast strip, for John Deere", November 22, 1960.
November 22, 1960. Pen and ink, graphite on tracing tissue. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-364.
